##############################################
XSockets 2.0 Service Installer - Nuget Package
##############################################

Steps...

#Install the service
1: Run setup.exe.

#Configuration
2: Open the location of your service.

3: Add your allowed origins to the setting (examples in the config).
   For example if you are running a project on localhost://1254 that origin has to be added to the list

4: Set location, 127.0.0.1 will work during development.

5: Save the configuration

6: Go to services and locate XSockets.NET 2.0

7: Right click and choose start

________________________________________________________________
If you have any questions/feedback feel free to email contact@xsockets.net

Regards
Team XSockets.NET
